mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id AS employeeId, e.employee_name AS employeeName, (SELECT c.detail_code_name FROM commoncodedetail c WHERE c.detail_code = e.employee_type_code) AS employeeType, (SELECT c.detail_code_name FROM commoncodedetail c WHERE c.detail_code = e.employee_status_code) AS employeeStatus FROM employeeinfo e
